contents.text: Thank you for calling Genomic Health Peninsula, where we transform cancer treatment decisions with clinically actionable diagnostics.
For information about our genomic diagnostic tests and patient support services, press '1'.
To order a test kit or schedule specimen collection, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a patient services representative.

navigationGoals: Request a test kit shipment and schedule specimen collection
I need to order a home genomic cancer test kit and schedule my specimen collection.
Order a next-generation sequencing test kit and schedule specimen collection
I need to order a genetic test kit and schedule my sample pickup.
I’m a physics student collaborating on a study; I’d like to order a genomic test kit and schedule specimen collection.

contents.text: To inquire about test results or patient support resources, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our patient support team.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my test results and access support resources
I need an update on my recent genomic test results and guidance on patient support resources.
Request detailed interpretation of my genomic diagnostic test results and patient support resources
I want to get my test results and find out about patient support services.
I need to review my recent genomic test results and learn about available patient support resources.

contents.text: For healthcare professional services and research partnerships, press '2'.
To place clinician orders and access clinical guidelines, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our clinician support team.

navigationGoals: Submit clinician orders and review clinical guidelines
I need to place a clinician order for a patient’s genomic diagnostic test and access the related clinical guidelines.
Place a clinician order for a targeted cancer panel and access the clinical guidelines
I need to help my doctor place an order and access the clinical testing guidelines.
I want to place an order for a clinician-level genomic test and access the clinical guidelines for my project.

contents.text: For research partnerships and trial collaborations, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our research collaborations department.

navigationGoals: Explore a partnership for a clinical research trial
I want to discuss a research partnership opportunity with the genetic oncology research team.
Initiate a research partnership for a breast cancer genomic trial collaboration
I'm looking for information on joining a research trial and collaborating on studies.
I’m exploring research partnership opportunities in genomic diagnostics for my physics research.
